work.name: CITRIS @ UC Davis Health
work.summary: Researching CV methods for healthcare, leveraging NLP and LLMs for early dementia detection, and developing algorithms for human activity recognition using video and vibration data.
highlights: Object detection, segmentation, and pose estimation in healthcare
NLP and LLM-based early dementia detection
Machine learning algorithms for human activity recognition

work.name: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, UC Davis
work.summary: Designed and taught lab assignments, delivered guest lectures, and mentored design teams.
highlights: Lab assignments focused on CNNs, segmentation, and object detection
Lectures on model optimization and pruning

work.name: RUBINET Lab
work.summary: Evaluated and optimized LLIE models for real-time inference and edge deployability.
highlights: Trade-offs in magnitude vs gradient-based pruning
Proposed custom loss functions to balance size and quality

projects.name: Dementia Detection from Audio Signals
projects.summary: Developing frameworks leveraging LLMs for early dementia detection.

projects.name: Health Applications Targeted Compression of Vision Models
projects.summary: Automating video annotation and aligning actions to time-series sensor data.

projects.name: Benchmarking MLLMs for Visual-Lingual Hallucinations

highlights: Counterintuitive dataset for testing lingual biases in multimodal models
